Package jdraw.framework

Contains all interfaces and implementations of the base framework of the JDraw editor.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DrawCommand The interface DrawCommand defines the functionality provided by commands which can be stored in the command history.
DrawCommandHandler The interface DrawCommandHandler defines the handler which allows to access the command history provided by a draw model.
DrawContext The interface DrawContext represents the context which contains and presents the draw view.
DrawModel The class DrawModel represents the model of a drawing, i.e.
DrawModelListener Listener interested in draw model changes.
DrawTool A tool defines a mode of the drawing view, intended to be set over a tool bar.
DrawToolFactory A DrawTool factory creates an instance of a draw tool and returns an icon which can be used in the tool palette of the graphics editor.
DrawView The class DrawView displays a graphic model.
Figure Base interface for all figures implemented in the graphic editor.
FigureGroup This interface provides access to figure parts for those figures which consist of several parts, as e.g. for group figures.
FigureHandle Handles are used to change a figure by direct manipulation.
FigureListener Listener interested in figure changes.
PointConstrainer A PointConstrainer is used to restrict the coordinates used when the mouse is clicked.
 

Class Summary
DrawModelEvent An event which indicates that a draw model has changed.
FigureEvent An event which indicates that a figure event occurred in a figure.
 

Enum Summary
DrawModelEvent.Type This enum describes the type of event.
 

Package jdraw.framework Description

Contains all interfaces and implementations of the base framework of the JDraw editor. The main interfaces that have to be used are defined here.

Version:
2.5
Author:
Dominik Gruntz & Christoph Denzler
